title: Water leaks from the roof in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing water leaking from the roof in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl is exposed to a lot of water on the roof of her house and becomes afraid. This vision indicates controlling great psychological pressure at this period in her life. Or seeing very cloudy water falling from the roof may indicate failure. This girl will achieve the dreams and aspirations that she was striving for. But if the girl feels happy and pleased with this water coming down from the ceiling. It promises her good news about marrying the person she wants to marry. If the ceiling that appears in the dream has many cracks, then she will face Many obstacles and difficult crises in the coming days. If the dreamer has already connected, the water falling from the ceiling in her dream is a sign of the breakup of the engagement due to many problems with this person. Some commentators believe that the turbid water falling from the ceiling may indicate that this The girl is suffering from a serious health epidemic. Or perhaps the turbid water falling from the ceiling is a warning sign for her, because she is committing many sins and immorality. The abundance of water in the dream indicates a number of positive opportunities that may appear before her, but on the condition that this water is clean. Read Also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a gas leak in a dream. Interpretation of seeing water leaking from the roof in a dream for a married woman. Dirty water falling from the ceiling of a married woman’s house represents many problems and marital strife between her and her husband. Also, seeing water falling from the ceiling also symbolizes that you will be exposed to a lot of pressure. Nervousness and crises in the coming days. As for the very clear water falling from the roof of her house onto it, this indicates the multiple sources of lawful livelihood that will appear before this woman. Seeing clear water falling from the roof also indicates that this will happen within the next few months. Or seeing water coming down from the ceiling could be a symbol of many big changes in her life. If water is abundant and dirty, she will face many difficult crises in her life. Or seeing dirty water in a dream could mean that some people are speaking falsely about that lady’s fame and honor. If the roof of the house breaks and water falls from it, it will go through many debts and financial crises during this period. Interpretation of a dream about water leaking from the roof in a pregnant woman’s dream: To see water leaking from the roof symbolizes the imminent date of giving birth, and the dreamer must prepare for this date. Or that the vision A pregnant woman leaking water may indicate ease of labor that the woman may go through. Ibn Sirin claims that water leaking from the roof is a sign of many big changes in this woman’s life. Some commentators believe that a little water leaking from the ceiling indicates that the girl is pregnant. While a lot of water indicates the birth of a boy. If the water coming down from the ceiling is cloudy, she will be exposed to some health crises during this pregnancy. Also, seeing dirty water coming down from the ceiling symbolizes controlling feelings of sadness and depression in her life.

title: Interpretation of a phone call in a dream: Seeing a mobile phone in a dream

preview.html: Contents: A dream about calling a mobile phone A phone call from a familiar person for a single married and pregnant woman Someone calling you A phone call from a lover From an ex-lover Mobile phone Interpretation of a dream about a call and a mobile phone When someone sees that he has received a call on his personal mobile phone, if he is a single girl or a single young man, then he is on the path of engagement and interaction with a person neither of them knows, why he calls does not judge the person who receives it or indicates that someone will ask for help or advice. When the dreamer receives a phone call on his phone, this means that the dreamer is engaged, and his marriage is near, and if he is single, his engagement is near. If the dreamer calls someone he does not know, the dream indicates that there is someone who will ask the dreamer for help in a matter or ask for his advice or advice in a particular matter. If the dreamer receives a call on the home phone, this means the whole family and indicates their happiness, sadness or poverty. If the caller is a relative, this means that he will tell the family some news that may be good or bad. If the caller is a stranger to the family, this indicates sadness and poverty. When the dreamer sees that he received a call from a lover or someone he cares about, this is evidence of the dreamer's attachment to worldly pleasures and whims, and this is bad. If the dreamer is pregnant and in the dream she received a call from one of her relatives, whether her brother, father, mother, or any of them, and he informed her of the good news, this means that her birth will be easy. Interpretation of a phone call in a married woman's dream When he receives a call or a phone call from someone about a pregnant woman, if the caller is a relative of hers, such as her brother, father, uncle, maternal uncle, nephew, niece, or husband, then if his words are good, she will find comfort and ease in her birth and then spend on herself and her newborn or more in her husband's expenses, and if the caller is one of these relatives and says something bad, this indicates a difficult period. In the event of a transient illness that a pregnant woman goes through during her pregnancy and ends after a short period, but if the caller is not a mahram, the issue is related to childbirth or people who infect the woman or the newborn or poverty on them. If the woman is married and not pregnant, there are those who give birth and there are those who do not give birth, and in both cases the matter indicates the nature of the call or call. Intrigues and misfortunes in her marital life and successive family troubles on successive days, and if the stranger asks for something in a moderate manner, he seeks to receive an order from the people of the house, and he may be one of those who see the defects of the house, and if he asks or tells something bad, he is one of the causes of troubles and intrigues in the family. Interpretation of a phone call in a pregnant woman's dream If the call is about a girl, pregnant or married, she received it from a friend or from a woman like her, this indicates constant communication and an increase in love and affection, if the conversation includes good things or if the viewer is happy to receive the call but sad and does not want

title: A detailed interpretation of a lunar eclipse in a dream

preview.html: I like it FansSubscribersFans A detailed interpretation of the lunar eclipse in a dream. Interpretation of the moon in a dream Scientists have interpreted that seeing the moon in a dream indicates the psychological and emotional changes that the dreamer will go through in the coming period and may indicate the psychological and emotional crises that he will face. Watching the moon and its clouds in a dream indicates a period of sadness and sorrow. The moon in a dream may indicate that the dreamer is a special and creative person. We see the moon full and close in a dream, this indicates the fulfillment of desires. Seeing the full moon in a dream indicates the return of an absent or traveler. Interpretation of a lunar eclipse in a dream. Seeing a lunar eclipse in a dream, this dream indicates The coming period of the dreamer's life, which will be dominated by sadness and sorrow, or it may indicate the loss of a loved one. Seeing a lunar eclipse in a dream can indicate illness or weakness, humiliation and loss of health. And seeing the night is dark and moonless. This dream indicates problems and shocks in the field of work, or it could The dream is a sign of a crisis and emotional problems. There are those who interpreted a dream of a dark, moonless night, and this dream indicates that the person is going through a stage in which he is distracted and weak. Interpretation of the moon falling in a dream Seeing the moon falling in a dream indicates the psychological state that the dreamer is going through and the extent of his fear of the future. Seeing the moon falling in a dream may mean that he will live isolated and far from people. Seeing the moon falling in a dream is a bad omen for the dreamer, as it indicates many worries and sorrows that he will live in. In any case, seeing the moon falling in a dream is not a good sign. It could be a sign of... An emotional crisis or problems at work. Interpretation of seeing more than one moon: Whoever sees many moons in a dream, this dream is good for the dreamer, because it indicates the realization of affection and love between the dreamer and his family members. Seeing more than one moon in a dream indicates the personality of the dreamer and that he is a person that people love. A single man who sees more than one moon in a dream, this dream indicates marriage. The book was written soon. Seeing more than one moon in a dream may indicate the conclusion of a new partnership in the field of work, thanks to which he will achieve a lot of profits. More than one moon in a dream means good company, old friends, and love between them. Therefore, we present to you all possible interpretations of seeing the moon and a lunar eclipse in a dream. For anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we welcome your comments at the end of the article and we will provide you with the explanation as quickly as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing a circle in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and Al-Usaimi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a circle in a dream. Does the symbol of menstruation in a dream indicate good or not? When does the menstrual cycle symbol translate into harm and problems? Learn about the most accurate signs of seeing your menstrual cycle in a dream from Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi, follow them below. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it. Search on Google for the dream interpretation site on the Internet. The circle in the dream. The jurists said that the dream interpretation of the menstrual cycle indicates a blessing and an ease of conditions and diet. But It is necessary to examine the vision of the menstrual cycle carefully and know all the details to ensure that its interpretation is benign, because there are symbols that appear in this vision that completely change its meaning, and they are as follows: Seeing menstruation and feeling severe pain: It indicates distress, as the student is surrounded by a huge number of crises and problems, and these Problems make her tired and sad most of the time. Seeing menstrual bleeding accompanied by heavy bleeding: It is borne by successive material experiences that reach the dreamer in breakthrough and heavy losses. Dreaming that menstrual blood is very red: indicates a serious illness or many fears. If the dreamer sees that he is menstruating and an amount of Very little blood, and after that he felt physical comfort and recovery, then this symbol is interpreted as follows: Health and strength: If the dreamer is sick with a disease in the area of ​​​​the vagina, uterus, or bladder and dreams of blood coming out of her vagina, then she breathes a sigh of relief and her condition improves in the vision, then the dream foretells With it. That the Lord of the Worlds will grant her great physical strength and well-being soon. Removing severe obstructions: Whoever lives in obstructions sees a mass of blood coming down from her womb, and pain as it descends, but after the mass descends, the observer feels happy and comfortable, because the vision is evidence of removing obstacles and breaking all barriers. Getting out of the predicament: The wise woman who was involved in problems related to the law and the judiciary actually prayed to the Lord of the Worlds before she slept to save her and save her from this predicament. Get rid of the scandal: If a woman sees that she is menstruating and no one sees her, and her clothes are long and the menstrual blood is not much, then the scene is good news for the woman. Which she believes God will cover her and the scandal that has plagued her. With lies and lies, they will disappear, and the truth will be seen by everyone. The circle in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin mentioned bad connotations of the symbol of menstruation in a dream. He said: Menstruation in a woman’s dream is evidence of her sins and disobedience. The more menstrual blood increases in the dream, the greater the dreamer’s vigilance with it. If a woman sees that she is menstruating In the dream, she complains about her husband’s abandonment, because he does not give her her legal rights in reality. If the dreamer dreams that she has purified herself through menstruation in the dream, then she removes the impurity from her heart, repents to the Lord of the Worlds and seeks His forgiveness. The path to Al-Osaimi’s dream. Al-Osaimi gave good news to the woman who dreams of menstruation. She said that the vision will translate into livelihood and money in the future. But if the dreamer sees that menstrual blood is very black, then this is a sign of suffering, anguish, and severe life pain. As for seeing black menstrual blood cleaned and cleaned in a dream, it shows the positive and happy days that the dreamer enjoys after... He went through difficult times and many problems in Alma

title: Interpretation of dreams about fasting in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about fasting in a dream in different situations. Fasting is one of the five pillars of Islam, and it is one of the best acts of worship through which a person gets closer to God. Therefore, God placed in Paradise a door called Bab Al-Rayyan through which only those who are fasting enter, and this indicates the status of those who are fasting with God, and he can see a person in a dream who has many dreams. Demonstrating fasting, whether fasting during Ramadan or elsewhere, and the interpretation of this vision varies according to the situation in which the person saw himself in the dream, whether he was fasting or not. Learn about the different interpretations of fasting through this encyclopedia article. Interpretation of the dream of fasting in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin says: If a person sees in his dream that he deliberately broke the fast in the month of Ramadan, this means that this person will fall into a great calamity, and that calamity may be murder. A person, but if a person sees in his dream that he is breaking his fast during the month of Ramadan, this indicates excessive fatigue. Ibn Sirin says: Fasting is evidence that there is an oath in his life, that he must die, and that he is cured of diseases. If a person sees in a dream that he is fasting, this indicates the repayment of debts, and salvation from the worries and problems that the person suffers from in his life. He says Ibn Sirin: If he sees that he broke his fast in Ramadan, this indicates that he has a lot of sustenance and an abundance of money, which the dreamer will obtain without fatigue or trouble. Interpretation of a dream about fasting in a dream by Ibn Shaheen: Ibn Shaheen says: If a person sees in a dream that He fasts the first ten days of the month of Muharram. This vision indicates asceticism, piety, and piety, and this vision indicates that whoever sees it will go to Umrah. But if a person dreams that he is fasting on the day of Ashura, this means that whoever sees the dream will do many good deeds. But if he sees If one sees in a dream that he fasts a man’s month, then this vision indicates that the dreamer will obtain an important position and receive a very high salary from this work. As for fasting on the day of doubt, this indicates that the dreamer is committing sins and disobedience in his life. Interpretation of fasting in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: He says The jurists who interpret dreams say that if a person sees in a dream that he is fasting on the days of judgment, then this vision indicates the release of the prisoner, the dreamer’s repentance, and the payment of his many debts. This vision is to discover worries and get rid of sorrows. But if a person sees in a dream that he is fasting forever, then this vision indicates that the person who sees it is following a very harsh Sunnah, and this vision indicates that the dreamer is a very silent person and does not like that. He talks to other people and follows the path of isolation. But if he fasts one day and breaks his fast one day, this indicates that the dreamer has two wives, one of whom is free and the other is secret, or a Muslim, and one of the people of the Dhimma. Interpretation of the evil of seeing fasting in a dream: Dream interpretation jurists say that if a person sees Dreaming that he is breaking the fast intentionally, this means that the dreamer is committing many forbidden things in his life, and this vision can also indicate the death of a person if the person is suffering from illness. But if he sees in a dream that he is breaking the fast or committing a great sin during the day of Ramadan, then this

title: Learn about the dream interpretation of a brother’s accident in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about an accident for a brother: The most dangerous thing that can happen to a man is that his brother suffers an accident, death, or disaster. A brother is a bond and a companion in this world, and when you see this symbol in a dream, it causes fear and panic to the dreamer, and he wants to know the interpretation to be sure whether this dream will bring him kindness and nothing will happen to him. Does his brother have protection or evil and seek refuge from them? We will study all of this in our article through a large number of different cases in which the brother’s accident occurred, as well as some of the interpretations received from major scholars and commentators such as the scholar Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a brother’s accident: Seeing a brother’s accident has many connotations that can be traced in the following cases: An accident with One brother in a dream indicates the emotional problems he faces with his lover. If the dreamer sees that his brother, who is studying, has had an accident in the dream, this indicates his failure in studying and his failure in exams, and he must be careful about his future and his studies. The dreamer saving her brother from an accident in a dream is an indication of... Her constant help and encouragement to achieve his goals. Interpretation of a dream about an accident for my brother, Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin discussed the interpretation of a dream about a brother by accident, and the following are some of the interpretations contained in it: Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a brother’s accident in a dream as the qualities of haste, recklessness, and not slowing down in making a decision. If the dreamer sees an accident about His brother in a dream, this symbolizes the conflicts and misunderstandings that will occur between them over the inheritance. The brother’s accident in a dream symbolizes the anguish and distress that the dreamer is experiencing at the present time, and he must return to God to alleviate his distress. Interpretation of a dream about an only brother with an accident. The interpretation of a brother’s accident in a dream varies depending on The dreamer's social status. Here is the interpretation of an unmarried girl who sees this symbol: An unmarried girl who sees that it is her brother, and she was involved in an accident in the dream, indicates that he will be exposed to problems and difficulties in his life. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream an accident involving her married brother, this symbolizes instability. His married life is due to many disputes. An unmarried brother’s dream of an accident is an indication of the worries and sorrows that plague his life and he cannot get rid of them. Interpretation of a dream of an accident for a married brother. Is the interpretation of a dream about a brother’s accident in a married woman’s dream interpreted as good or bad? To answer this question, you must continue reading the following cases: A married woman who sees her brother’s accident in her dream is a sign of her poor psychological state, which is reflected in her dreams. A brother’s accident in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will suffer a major financial loss at work during the coming period. For a married woman to see that her brother was involved in an accident in a dream indicates her strong interest in him and her attachment to him. Interpretation of a dream about an accident for a pregnant brother: A pregnant woman has many dreams filled with mysterious symbols that she cannot understand, so we will help her interpret her vision of her brother’s accident as follows: The pregnant woman who dreams that Her brother had an accident and survived. It is a sign that she is sick, but she will recover soon.

title: Interpretation of dreams to see a bite in a dream and its interpretations

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a bite in a dream. Many people are seriously searching for an interpretation of their vision that they are bitten in a dream, because they believe that it is an unpleasant dream, and therefore they live in fear, tension, and anxiety in a very great way. A good method, and it is worth noting that interpretation scholars have confirmed that it is not necessary to follow a frightening dream in a dream whose interpretation is not good, so we will present and clarify all the information about this article.Interpretation of a dream about seeing a bite in a dreamThere are many different opinions about the interpretation of seeing a bite in a dream, so in In this regard, we would like to mention the most important and prominent interpretations derived from the following points: In general, seeing a bite during a dream means that the bite is love, even if it is caused by a dog’s teeth. Therefore, a bite is disliked and not good even if it is from silver claws. Because as it was said A bite during a dream is love, but a bite in a dream can symbolize responsibility. Therefore, a bite in a dream can be regret and anger, and God knows best. Whoever sees himself in a dream biting himself is selfish and violating the rights of others. While seeing a bite from an unknown person In a dream, this indicates a person who is jealous of the host. Also, a painful bite in a dream is a clear sign of anger. If the bite leaves a mark or you see a bite mark in a dream, it may be a reprimand from a relative, brother, or friend. While you see in The dream is biting a dead soul, that is, if the living person is dead in the dream, he clings to his opinion and approaches him and follows his path and steps. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a biteSee also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a mouth in a dream, and a big mouth and a small mouth in a dream Interpretation of seeing a bite by Ibn Sirin and Al-NabulMany interpretations were given from The most famous and experienced interpreters in the field of interpretation, such as Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin, regarding seeing a bite in a dream, but their interpretation was as follows: Ibn Sirin sees in the interpretation of this dream that a bite in a dream can indicate great love for the other person who bites him. Whether That bite was a human or another person, it is a snake bite or perhaps a scorpion or some animal. It should be noted that the bite, if there is blood in the dream, is a symbol of forbidden love. Also, a bite in a dream can indicate malice, hatred and aggression. As for In the case of biting a finger, this may indicate that the fortuneteller is risking religion, and God knows best. As for Al-Nabulsi, he says that seeing a bite in a dream could be a misfortune, anguish, or distress. A bite in a dream may indicate joy and pleasure at first, while a bite that leads to The appearance of conjunctivitis or pain in the heart, which is a sign of sin in distress. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a bite. See also: Interpretation of seeing a puppy in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a bite in a dream for a woman. The woman is in a state of extreme panic and fear, as she sees in her dream that she is being bitten by another person. Or perhaps by a human being, and here we will explain the most important interpretations about that through the following lines: Seeing a sting in a married woman’s dream symbolizes giving and taking. It also indicates

title: Interpretation of seeing a grave in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a grave in a dream: What does an open grave mean in a dream? What did the great jurists say about seeing entering a grave in a dream and sleeping in it? What is the interpretation of seeing building a grave in a dream? There are many cases dedicated to the grave symbol, which you will learn about in the following paragraphs. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it. Search on Google for the dream interpretation site on the Internet. The grave in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about a cemetery indicates violation of laws and the dreamer’s entry into prison. If the dreamer builds a beautiful grave in In a dream, he is actually building a large house to live in. Walking next to graves in a dream means relieving the dreamer of pain and removing worries from his life. If the dreamer goes to the graves and distributes food and drink to the poor and hungry in the dream, this indicates the necessity of giving zakat to his deceased relatives as part of Money. If the dreamer sees an open grave in a dream and puts dirt on it until it is completely filled, this indicates a long life and strong health. Seeing the entrance to the grave indicates the torment and torment that the dreamer experiences in his life, as he may soon be afflicted with illness or hardship and poverty. If fire comes out of The grave in a dream indicates the torment of the owner of the grave and his entry into Hell, and God knows best. Seeing the grave being washed in a dream means that the dreamer’s life will be clean and free of sins and transgressions. The grave in a dream by Ibn Sirin. If the dreamer climbs onto the roof of the house in a dream and wants to dig a grave for himself in this place, the dream turns into a long life and the dreamer may die after the death of most of his family members in reality. If the dreamer sees that he is walking on an unfamiliar road and sees many cemeteries on this road, the dream warns the dreamer of scammers who are approaching him to ruin his life. If he visits The dreamer has his dead father in the cemetery and sees in a dream rain falling on the grave, then this is evidence of the security and peace that the dead person receives inside the grave. If one of the dreamer’s relatives is in prison while he is awake and the dreamer sees that he is visiting the graves in the dream, this is interpreted by the dreamer visiting his relatives in prison The grave in a dream of Imam al-Sadiq. Digging a grave in a dream of a true Imam is interpreted as many changes that the dreamer will experience in his life. If an unmarried woman digs a grave in a dream, enters it and sits in it, this is a sign that she will review her accounts, and think a lot about her life to find out what she has. And what she must do, and begin to modify her behavior in order to appear in society in a better appearance. If the dreamer digs one of the graves for his relatives in a dream and finds money and a lot of gold in it, this is a sign that the dreamer will receive a large inheritance from the owner of the cemetery, and God knows best. The grave In an unmarried woman’s dream, the interpretation of a dream about a grave for an unmarried woman indicates marriage, but if she enters the grave against her will in a dream, this indicates that she will marry a young man whom she does not love, and her life with him will be difficult. And sad. If a single girl sees that she is digging a grave in a dream, this is a sign that she does not want to get married and move on

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing figs in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing figs in a dream by Ibn Sirin, as it is known that figs are one of the fruits that many people prefer and have a special taste for them, and of course seeing them in a dream carries many interpretations. And there are many interpretations. They are usually positive interpretations and good interpretations, which many interpretation scholars have taken care to clarify. In this context, we learn about the interpretation of the dream of seeing figs in a dream from Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of seeing figs in a dream by Ibn Sirin, especially since the scholar Ibn Sirin is considered one of The most important interpretation scholars who always provide a lot of evidence and meanings about dreams, and in this context we explain to you the interpretation of the dream of seeing figs in a dream by Ibn Sirinho also: Figs in a dream are considered evidence of goodness and a lot of food, and they also indicate money because money is legal and comes after effort. And whoever sees himself eating figs in a dream, this is evidence of happiness. While whoever sees in a dream that he is giving figs as a gift. This vision is evidence of the achievement of many goals, aspirations and desires that the opinion wants. Likewise, if one sees a fig tree in a dream, whether he is a man, single or married. It is evidence of a single girl who will soon marry a decent man with high morals. As long as the woman is married God Almighty will honor her with pregnancy and she will give birth to a beautiful child free of diseases and in good health. In addition, it indicates the recovery of the patient, and the fulfillment of many desires and goals that the opinion seeks to achieve in his future life. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing Al-Hayla in detail by the most famous interpreters. Interpretation of the vision Dried figs for a single woman: Seeing figs in a dream has different interpretations, depending on the type of figs she dreams of, as interpretations differ regarding seeing dried figs from regular figs, and in this context we will learn more about the interpretation of seeing dried figs for a single woman. It is also: If one sees an unmarried girl in In a dream, it means eating dried figs. This dream is evidence of excellence in study, success in work, and achieving desired goals. Also, if one sees dried fig leaves in an unmarried woman’s dream. This indicates that she did not complete the things that this girl desires, but rather For a new beginning that changes her life for the better. Also, if dry, immature figs are seen in a woman’s dream. It is evidence of the inability to make fatal decisions correctly, and the reason for this is haste and this girl is wise. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a sacrifice in a dream by Ibn Sirin In detail, the interpretation of a dream about figs in a dream for a married woman: Seeing figs in a dream for a married woman has many interpretations, as it is often evidence of goodness and happiness for the monarch, and in this context we will explain the interpretation of a dream about figs in a dream for a married woman is also: If a married woman dreams of eating figs, then
